TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) が、ASP.NET と互換性があるモードで実行中である、または実行可能であるかどうかを指定します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] compatibility mode allows [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] services to use ASP features such as identity impersonation. It is enabled at the application level through the Web.config file and cannot be overridden by Web.config files nested in the application. When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode> value is not specified for a service, it gets <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode.Allowed> behavior by default. For more information, see [serviceHostingEnvironment](http://msdn.microsoft.com/ja-jp/4f8a7c4f-e735-4987-979a-b74fcdae2652).
## 例 Service developers can ensure that their service is only run in ASP.NET Compatibility Mode by setting the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode> property on the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsAttribute> to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode.Required> as shown in the following example:
[!code-csharp[S\_AspNetCompatibility\#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S\_AspNetCompatibility\#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#1)]
[!code-csharp[S\_AspNetCompatibility\#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/cs/service.cs#2)] [!code-vb[S\_AspNetCompatibility\#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_aspnetcompatibility/vb/service.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode Allowed = int32(1)

Docs.summary: WCF サービスは、ASP.NET 互換モードを または に設定した状態で、アプリケーション ドメインで実行できます。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode NotAllowed = int32(0)

Docs.summary: WCF サービスは、ASP.NET 互換モードを に設定した状態で、アプリケーション ドメインで実行する必要があります。

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.Activation.AspNetCompatibilityRequirementsMode Required = int32(2)

Docs.summary: WCF サービスは、ASP.NET 互換モードを に設定した状態で、アプリケーション ドメインで実行する必要があります。
